video_title: Why You Can't Get Away From Your Toxic Ex
transcript:
there's one last really interesting
thing about emotionally turbulent
relationships and why human beings are
more attracted to them this kind of
explains why you can't get away from
your toxic ex sometimes we're confused
like why don't I just like stop seeing
this person I know it's bad for me but I
can't help myself so it turns out that
there's a lot of really interesting
neuroscience and Physiology about what
attracts us to our toxic exes so it's a
really fascinating study that was done
where they had people dating and the
only difference between dates was that
one was on a bridge that was made of
stone and the other is on a bridge that
was like rickety and what they sort of
found is that the emotional fear of the
rickety bridge made people fall in love
with each other more that anytime you're
in an emotionally unstable environment
it causes people to bond and so one
really interesting thing about red flag
relationships is that early like
turbulence in the relationship creates
actually a lot of negative emotion and
then you'll kind of bind together and
work through it
